question: What reagents would be necessary to carry out the following transformations? **(a)** Cyclohexanecar- bonyl chloride $\ce{->}$ pentanoylcyclohexane; **(b)** 2-butenedioic (maleic) anhydride $\ce{->}$ (*Z*)-2-butene-1,4-diol; **(c)** 3-methylbutanoyl bromide $\ce{->}$ 3-methylbutanal; **(d)** benzamide $\ce{->}$ 1-phenylmethanamine; **(e)** propanenitrile $\ce{->}$ 3-hexanone; **(f)** methyl propanoate $\ce{->}$​ 4-ethyl-4-heptanol.
